verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Purify my heart,
let me be as gold
and precious silver.
Purify my heart,
let me be as gold,
pure gold.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Refiner's fire,
my heart's one desire
is to be holy,
set apart for you, Lord.
I choose to be holy,
set apart for you my master,
ready to do your will.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Purify my heart,
cleanse me from within
and make me holy.
Purify my heart,
cleanse me from my sin,
deep within.
